StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_GENCANDIDATE_PROFESSEDEXAM]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as SET ARITHABORT OFF set arithignore on set ansi_warnings o.
declare @ssn varchar(9), @person_id int, @exam_type char(1), @exam_date date.me, @exam_entered_date date.me, @exam_score .oat, @exam_score2 .oat, @exam_score3 .oat, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @aacn varchar(15), @edt .oat, @pa varchar(2), @asvab .oat, @asvab_date date.me
declare professed cursor for
select SSN, AACN, convert(.oat,ENGLISH_DIAGNOSTIC_TEST_SCORE), PUBLIC_AFFAIRS_INTERVIEW_CODE, convert(.oat,MEPS_AFQT), ASVAB_DTE
from arms..ARMS179
open professed
fetch professed into @ssn,@aacn,@edt,@pa,@asvab,@asvab_date
select @user_login = 'migra.on' select @update_date = getdate() select @exam_entered_date = getdate()
while (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) begin select @person_id = PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn
if @aacn is not NULL begin
if not exists (select MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID from CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'M' and MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id and EXAM_DATE = @asvab_date) begin
select @exam_type = 'M' select @exam_date = @asvab_date select @exam_score = 2.7 select @exam_score2 = NULL select @exam_score3 = NULL
insert CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID,PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE,EXAM_DATE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE,EXAM_SCORE,EXAM_SCORE2,EXAM_SCORE3, USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values (@person_id,@exam_type,@exam_date,@exam_entered_date,@exam_score, @exam_score2,@exam_score3,@user_login,@update_date)
print @ssn +'Added AACN to Professed' end else print @ssn+'Is not involved in music' end
if @edt != 0 begin
if not exists (select MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID from CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'D' and MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id and EXAM_DATE = @asvab_date)
begin select @exam_type = 'D' select @exam_score = @edt select @exam_date = @asvab_date select @exam_score2 = NULL select @exam_score3 = NULL
insert CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID,PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE,EXAM_DATE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE,EXAM_SCORE,EXAM_SCORE2,EXAM_SCORE3, USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values (@person_id,@exam_type,@exam_date,@exam_entered_date,@exam_score, @exam_score2,@exam_score3,@user_login,@update_date)
print @ssn+' English Test added' end else print @ssn+'Did not recieve an english test'
end
if @pa = 'Y' begin
if not exists (select MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID from CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'P' and MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id and EXAM_DATE = @asvab_date)
begin select @exam_type = 'P' select @exam_score = 1 select @exam_date = @asvab_date select @exam_score2 = NULL select @exam_score3 = NULL
insert CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID,PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE,EXAM_DATE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE,EXAM_SCORE,EXAM_SCORE2,EXAM_SCORE3, USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values (@person_id,@exam_type,@exam_date,@exam_entered_date,@exam_score, @exam_score2,@exam_score3,@user_login,@update_date)
print @ssn+' Public A.airs added' end end if @asvab is not NULL begin
if not exists (select MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID from CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'A'
and MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id and EXAM_DATE = @asvab_date)
begin select @exam_type = 'A' select @exam_score = @asvab select @exam_date = @asvab_date select @exam_score2 = NULL select @exam_score3 = NULL
insert CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID,PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE,EXAM_DATE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE,EXAM_SCORE,EXAM_SCORE2,EXAM_SCORE3, USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values (@person_id,@exam_type,@exam_date,@exam_entered_date,@exam_score, @exam_score2,@exam_score3,@user_login,@update_date)
print @ssn+' Asab added' end end
fetch professed into @ssn,@aacn,@edt,@pa,@asvab,@asvab_date
end
close professed
deallocate professed
